Description: A leading provider of technology rental solutions to the events industry, offering equipment like iPads, laptops, badge printers, registration kiosks, scanners, and accessories with a focus on sustainability and service.

Provider of plastic-free badge solutions to help event professionals reduce waste and deliver sustainable events.
